title: Tom Sheehan from Indecision/Most Precious Blood & Axe To Grind Podcast
itunes:title: Tom Sheehan from Indecision/Most Precious Blood & Axe To Grind Podcast
description:
Episode 174 - This episode was a long one in the making and shows how sometimes a really good idea falls by the wayside with some absentmindedness. Tom and I met up in New York City and hung out on my friends balcony to discuss early international touring, life in NYC and the transition out of road life. According to our illustrious producer, Tom Richfield, it's one of his favorite episodes so I won't argue.This episode is brought to you by Bridge Nine Records and their upcoming new release from H20 called "Use Your Voice". Pre-order this and many other high quality releases now

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
